CutSceneText.Text: The castle gates are a fortress's first line of defense.
They are strong enough to withstand most attacks,
and if the defenders repair the gates with the Gate Guardian Stone, they can withstand a siege forever.
The Gate Guardian Stone repairs the gates
only when the defenders are using the Gate Restoration Stone.
So if the attackers can deactivate the Restoration Stone,
the castle gates will collapse instantly.
Siege weapons can also obliterate castle gates,
so destroying enemy siege weapons is our top priority.
